name: AION (itch)
description:
//AION is a Short Full Motion Video Interactive Drama about Love,  AI and Pot Noodles by the Arts Collective Jaxbanded Theatre// 

Welcome to AION, a dating service that's been personalized,

just for you.

Incorporating elements from Film, Theatre and Video Games get ready to  embark on the date of a lifetime.

Well, Your lifetime anyway.

Content Warnings:

Flickering/ Flashing Lights

Loud Noises

Strong Language

Discussions of a sexual nature

Instructions:

-Press the 'Run Interactive Drama' button

- Press the start button.

- Click on choices as they arise to move the narrative forward.

-Press F11 on PC for Fullscreen

*AION requires a stable internet connection to be experienced smoothly

Music by: Loners

Please ask for permission before redistributing this work in an official or altered form. 

Reporting of any bugs found is greatly appreciated.
